title: Leeds United Live: Middlesbrough 3-0 Leeds United - BBC News
summary: all the action and reaction as middlesbrough beat leeds 3-0 .
nugent scores after three minutes to send leeds behind .
own goal from bellusci gives boro second goal .
antenucci has goal disallowed for leeds .
fabbrini scores third to resign leeds to defeat .

documents.title: good eveningmiddlesbrough 3-0 leeds
text: so leeds ' excellent record against middlesbrough has come to an end in horrible fashion .
keep an eye on
we 'll be back next weekend when leeds take on birmingham city at elland road .
thanks for joining us , and have a great evening .

documents.title: more from roslermiddlesbrough 3-0 leeds
text: some more from rosler on today 's defeat .
`` i am happy with the way we played , '' he said .
`` today we were n't on top of it at the decisive moments .
i want answers and then we move on .
`` it would be unfair to go into details about any individual player .
i saw the game , you saw the game and that is where we should leave it .
`` with botaka , we did n't know what we would get but i was happy with what i got .
i think it was an encouraging debut .
`` i think we are too nice .
when the linesman was there i saw middlesbrough players there - i saw no leeds players there .
sometimes , we do n't go far enough and we are too nice . ''

documents.title: reaction from roslermiddlesbrough 3-0 leeds
text: uwe rosler has been speaking to bbc leeds commentator adam pope .
`` the second half we were clearly on top , '' he said .
`` a major decision went against us and stuani should not have been on the pitch .
`` to me it was a goal .
the linesman asked for help from the referee .
the decision went in favour of middlesbrough and it was the wrong decision .
`` the referee got it wrong .
my team today participated in a game that was very nice to watch , but we lost 3-0 . ''

documents.title: thoughts from noelmiddlesbrough 3-0 leeds
text: middlesbrough did n't have to work for those goals .
they were gifts on a plate .
it 's not good enough .
i believe the selection was wrong .
to change a centre back partnership on such a big occasion , against a team fighting for promotion , did n't help .
it 's an area you do n't want to tinker around with , and they have .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: full time middlesbrough 3-0 leeds
text: that 's that - leeds ' fine record at the riverside comes to an end in horrible fashion .
the most frustrating thing is that leeds have masterminded their own downfall .
three poor defensive mistakes have cost them three goals - they were on top for much of the second half .
antenucci 's disallowed goal did little to cheer leeds up , but the game was lost before then .
send us your thoughts

documents.title: middlesbrough 3-0 leeds
text: four minutes of added time ahead .

documents.title: middlesbrough 3-0 leeds
text: another chance for antenucci , who finds himself clear on goal , but he ca n't keep the ball under control .
there 's one touch too many and boro 's defence swoop in .

documents.title: middlesbrough 3-0 leeds
text: middlesbrough have all but secured that fifth successive championship win .
it 's been a better half from leeds but again , it 's those defensive mistakes that have cost them .
another change for boro , as forshaw replaces leadbitter .

documents.title: goal fabbrini middlesbrough 3-0 leeds
text: oh , leeds .
in a second half that they 've largely dominated , they 've gone another goal down , and it 's another mistake they can only blame themselves for .
bamba loses his footing and slips , allowing fabbrini to snatch the ball and slot it past silvsetri .
that 's it for leeds , i 'm afraid .

documents.title: middlesbrough 2-0 leeds
text: a late tackle by ayala hands leeds another free-kick .
mowatt tries to go over but it hits the wall and straight into boro 's position .
it 's a quick reaction from mowatt , though , to wrestle the ball out of play .

documents.title: middlesbrough 2-0 leeds
text: bellusci might want to run for the coach home - he tries to pass through to a white shirt and can only find the the chest of a boro player .
boro are doing their best to slow down play .
it 's been a more dominant half from leeds .

documents.title: middlesbrough 2-0 leeds
text: free kick to middlesbrough and it 's well defended by leeds .
it 's been a better display than the second half , and antenucci and mowatt have been strong , but those early mistakes have cost leeds dearly .

documents.title: middlesbrough 2-0 leeds
text: leeds are still building the pressure as botaka crosses in to antenucci .
antenucci is close and the header is accurate , but it 's well held by the keeper .

documents.title: middlesbrough 2-0 leedsgoal ?
text: a huge call from the referee as antenucci scores - and the referee rules it offside .
berardi 's volley deflected through to antenucci , who was six yards out and slotted the ball home .
the flag was n't up and the linesman did n't move - it was the referee who made the decision .
rosler is absolutely fuming on the sidelines .

documents.title: middlesbrough 2-0 leeds
text: a crowd of 27,694 at the riverside today - 2,652 of those are some very quiet leeds fans
a foul on cook gives leeds a free-kick , and it 's a fine effort from mowatt , who has been one bright spot for leeds today .
the free-kick is powerful but the keeper gets a glove on it to tip it over the bar .
good pressure from leeds .

documents.title: middlesbrough 2-0 leeds
text: a second foul from stuani on taylor earns the boro player a talking to - he was already given a yellow after an earlier tackle on taylor .
it 's a free kick for leeds but it 's easily cleared .
boro then break , but good defending from taylor ends adomah 's efforts .

documents.title: no changes for leedsmiddlesbrough 2-0 leeds

so , leeds fans , what do they need to do in the second half ?
there have been a few chances for leeds , mostly through mowatt , but both goals have come from leeds errors .

documents.title: noel on belluscimiddlesbrough 2-0 leeds
text: it 's been shocking defending from the word go .
he 's been shambolic and i personally do n't think he should be on the pitch .
he should n't be playing for leeds united .
i do n't think he 's good enough .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: half-time middlesbrough 2-0 leeds
text: a dreadful pass from bellusci caps off a terrible first-half for the defender , and he leaves to the sounds of boos from the away end .
that 's been a very poor effort from leeds .
leeds were slow to react to stop the first goal , and bellusci 's own goal undid some quiet rebuilding from the rest of the squad .

documents.title: middlesbrough 2-0 leeds
text: a fine cross from downing has stuani running forward , but cook is quick enough to deflect the ball away .
leadbitter fires in a fine corner and ayala gets the slightest of touches , but the ball rolls wide .

documents.title: middlesbrough 2-0 leeds
text: another near chance for boro , as stuani gets in front of taylor , but he ca n't cross into the goal .
we 're minutes away from half-time - get those tweets coming in

documents.title: middlesbrough 2-0 leeds
text: a bit better from leeds , as botaka and mowatt come together to get the ball into boro 's half .
mowatt shoots from the edge of the box - it beats the keeper 's dive but it bounces wide of the post .
and another dreadful moment for bellusci , who goes into a tackle with his elbow high and elbows his marker in the back of the head .

documents.title: middlesbrough 2-0 leedsnoel on bellusci
text: i personally do n't think bellusci is good enough to play .
he 's got lots of ability but i do n't think his level of football is right .
i think there 's too many mistakes in him .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: middlesbrough 2-0 leeds
text: a better period from leeds , as dallas goes for goal , but the keeper easily gathers the ball .
a fine shot from mowatt has power and the direction , but it 's scrambled by the keeper to keep leeds trailing .

documents.title: popey on the own goalmiddlesbrough 2-0 leeds
text: without chris wood , leeds are struggling .
they 've not gone forward enough and they 've not gone over the top .
there 's been a few threats on the goal but nothing major .
that 's a dreadful mistake by bellusci .
author: Adam Pope
Leeds United Commentator

documents.title: own goal bellusci middlesbrough 2-0 leeds
text: ah .
bellusci , who has had a mixed game to say the least , has headed into his own net .
a fine , powerful cross from friend came soaring in and bellusci , trying to clear , panicked , dived and headed it past silvestri .
that 's an awful mistake - just as leeds were starting to find a little bit of confidence .

documents.title: middlesbrough 1-0 leeds
text: a slightly better period for leeds , with adeyemi looking to push forward .
they 're targeting the left side and adeyemi has an attempt from 20 yards out .
it 's a weak shot , though , and it 's grabbed easily by the keeper .

documents.title: middlesbrough 1-0 leeds
text: katherine hannah leeds united fans in great voice despite conceding the early goal `` we 're not famous anymore ''

documents.title: middlesbrough 1-0 leeds
text: there 's a break in play as amorebieta and mowatt collide .
the two jumped for the ball and collided - mowatt has his head bandaged after the clash and both players are back on their feet .

documents.title: middlesbrough 1-0 leeds
text: antenucci attempts to go for goal , but ayala is quick and pulls off a good tackle to end his run .
some good work between antenucci , botaka and berardi brings leeds close to an equaliser , but antenucci ca n't get enough power through the shot and it 's an easy save for the keeper .

documents.title: middlesbrough 1-0 leeds united
text: first attacking move from leeds , as dallas takes a run down the right .
dallas pushes kalas down and boro take a free kick .
every time leeds break free , boro close them down .

documents.title: middlesbrough 1-0 leeds
text: nervy moment for leeds as bamba very nearly chests the ball into his own goal .
some good attacking work from boro again pushes leeds back , and bamba , trying to clear the ball , ca n't keep it under control .
it 's quick work from silvestri , who flies to catch the ball that bamba chests his way , but it 's not looking good for leeds .

documents.title: middlesbrough 1-0 leeds
text: not an ideal start , but leeds must regroup now .
middlesbrough are right in leeds half however , but a good move between taylor and silvestri avoids any mishaps .

documents.title: middlesbrough 1-0 leedsnoel on the goal
text: leeds have given themselves a difficult start .
it was middlesbrough 's first attack and we have n't dealt with it .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: goal nugent middlesbrough 1-0 leeds
text: blimey , talk about a quick start !
stuani breaks through leeds defence , who are n't quick enough to react , and crosses in to nugent after a clear run down the right .
nugent , close to the net , smashes the ball home and leeds are behind after just two minutes .

documents.title: noel on today 's gameleeds v middlesbrough
text: i think this is leeds biggest challenge to date .
we 're into the season now .
although they played burnley at teh start of the season , you can be rusty at the beginning .
they 've been at a it a bit longer now , there 's points on the board and more structure .
this is the big test now .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: what do leeds need to improve ? leeds v middlesbrough
text: the midfield area needs to be stronger .
we need to be better and quicker at closing down and wee have to up the second balls in the midfield .
it was too easy for mk dons to get the ball out .
we did n't take the game to them in the second half .
it was a fragile score line , leeds had the perfect opportunity but they allowed mk to get back into the game .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: welcome will buckleyleeds v middlesbrough
text: winger will buckley is the latest loan signing for leeds united , with the club hoping to make the move permanent .
buckley will join the club on a 93-day emergency loan , which will keep him at the club until january .
he has been in leeds plans for a while , having had limited opportunities at sunderland , and will add depth to the squad , along with botaka and dallas .

documents.title: noel on boroleeds v middlesbrough
text: there is pressure on boro .
i think they 'll be looking for automatic promotion and not having to go through the play off experience again .
it 's a lottery - they 'd been playing so well last season and then in the play off they never really turned up .
downing and taylor will be a crucial battle .
charlie does n't need to worry about him going past him - i think he 's got the strength and pace to hold him off .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: clayton faces old clubleeds v middlesbrough
text: midfielder adam clayton will face his old side leeds for the third time in today 's game .
clayton joined boro last august and played in the 1-0 defeat at home to the whites .
boro , however , are on a run of six successive wins - one clayton will be hoping to extend .

documents.title: head to headleeds v middlesbrough
text: leeds have only lost once at the riverside but they will face a confident middlesbrough side .
aitor karanka 's side have lost just once this season , back in august , and sit eight places above leeds .
united , however , have a history of bettering boro , having won five of their last seven meetings .

documents.title: get involvedleeds v middlesbrough
text: got some score predictions for us ?
are you excited to see botaka in action ?
how much will leeds miss wood ?
tweets us your thoughts throughout the game

documents.title: no wood for leedsleeds v middlesbrough
text: a huge blow for leeds with chris wood ruled out of today 's game after up a knock in training .
wood has scored four goals this season , with three of them coming away from home .
he was calm and collected in last week 's victory over dons , slotting home a penalty to give leeds the lead , and leeds will miss his sharpness in the field .

documents.title: noel on the teamleeds v middlesbrough
text: botaka being an unknown quantity might work in our favour with players not knowing about him .
i had a feeling he might play today .
he 's been given a chance and its now time to shine and see what he has to offer .
i want to see him be direct , be positive and causing middlesbrough problems by linking up with antenucci .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: team newsleeds v middlesbrough
text: a big blow for leeds as chris wood is missing from the side .
he has n't travelled with the squad - he up a knock in training .
there 's a start , however , for jordan botaka , with antenucci also coming in .
leeds united xi : silvestri , berardi , bellusci , bamba , taylor , adeyemi , cook , mowatt , botaka , dallas , antenucci .
middlesbrough xi : dimi , kalas , ayala , amorebieta , friend , clayton , leadbitter , downing , adomah , stuani , nugent .

documents.title: popey on byramleeds v middlesbrough
text: it would be nice to see sam prove the doubters wrong .
i think it 's wrong with people saying to just get rid of him and not play him .
sam is here so that suggests he could well start .
i think he 's a top class player .
he 's definitely getting the support he needs - not from the chairman , but definitely from the coach .
author: Adam Pope
Leeds United Commentator

documents.title: rosler on byramleeds v middlesbrough
text: leeds ' adam pope spoke to uwe rosler ahead of the game , with the manager offering a few words of comfort for byram .
`` this club has a unique opportunity to build its future around its young players .
sam byram is one of them , '' he said .
`` i wo n't comment on the interview with the chairman .
all my decisions are based on football .
`` i spoke to sam on wednesday and will do so before the game .
we will then decide if he plays . ''

documents.title: byram and cellinoleeds v middlesbrough
text: it 's been a tough week for youngster sam byram .
in an interview with sky sports , chairman cellino let rip at byram , saying he was `` hurt '' by byram 's desire to leave the club .
cellino accused byram of thinking elland road `` is not big enough for him , '' and went on to say he was `` deeply offended . ''

documents.title: popey on boroleeds v middlesbrough
text: the riverside is pretty close to the top of the list of the best away grounds for leeds .
united have lost there just once in 13 matches overall and they won the last meeting between the two 1-0 , with mowatt scoring .
boro head coach aitor karanka is yet to win in four matches in charge against leeds , with his managerial bow coming at elland road when the teessider 's lost 2-1 in november 2013 .
leeds boast a five-match unbeaten away record in the championship .
united have lost just three league matches on their travels this calendar year in 15 outings , winning eight .
author: Adam Pope
Leeds United Commentator

documents.title: good afternoonleeds v middlesbrough
text: welcome to this afternoon 's live coverage of leeds united v middlesbrough .
leeds will be hoping to put aside any off the pitch dramas and build on
it 's a big test for them today as they take on second placed middlesbrough - who do n't have the happiest record against leeds .
keep an eye on us while you listen to the match on bbc radio leeds on 92.4 fm , 103.9 fm & freeview channel 719 to see if leeds can claim a second successive victory .
kick off is at 13:15 bst .
